exceptions.exn: In environment p0, p1 : preDTA a : ad t : term Hrec : reconnaissance p1 a t Unable to unify "liste_reconnait ?M1851 prec_empty tnil" with "reconnaissance (u_merge p0 p1) (uad_conv_1 a) t".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p1 a t -> reconnaissance (u_merge p0 p1) (uad_conv_1 a) t

Premises:
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
ad = N : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list
uad_conv_1 = fun a : ad => match a with | 0%N => 1%N | N.pos p => N.pos p~1 end : ad -> ad
u_merge = fun p0 p1 : preDTA => MapMerge state (udta_conv_0 p0) (udta_conv_1 p1) : preDTA -> preDTA -> preDTA
u_merge_2 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p0 a t -> reconnaissance (u_merge p0 p1) (uad_conv_0 a) t
u_merge_1 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p1) a = Some s -> MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s
u_conv1_r : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance (udta_conv_1 p) (uad_conv_1 a) t -> reconnaissance p a t
u_conv1 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> reconnaissance (udta_conv_1 p) (uad_conv_1 a) t
u_merge_1r : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s -> forall b : ad, a = uad_conv_1 b -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p1) a = Some s
u_merge_0 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a = Some s -> MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s
u_merge_inv_1_dta : forall (p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p1 a t -> Prop
u_merge_0r : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s -> forall b : ad, a = uad_conv_0 b -> MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a = Some s
u_merge_inv_0_dta : forall (p0 : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p0 a t -> Prop
u_conv0_r : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance (udta_conv_0 p) (uad_conv_0 a) t -> reconnaissance p a t
u_conv0 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> reconnaissance (udta_conv_0 p) (uad_conv_0 a) t
u_conv_rec_0_r : forall (p0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p0 a0 t -> Prop
u_conv_rec_1_r : forall (p0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p0 a0 t -> Prop
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
upl_conv_1 = fix upl_conv_1 (p : prec_list) : prec_list := match p with | prec_cons a p0 p1 => prec_cons (uad_conv_1 a) (upl_conv_1 p0) (upl_conv_1 p1) | prec_empty => prec_empty end : prec_list -> prec_list
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
u_conv_rec_0 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop
dta_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop
u_conv_rec_1 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop
u_merge_inv_1_st : forall (p1 : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p1 s t -> Prop
upl_conv_0 = fix upl_conv_0 (p : prec_list) : prec_list := match p with | prec_cons a p0 p1 => prec_cons (uad_conv_0 a) (upl_conv_0 p0) (upl_conv_0 p1) | prec_empty => prec_empty end : prec_list -> prec_list
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
u_conv_disj : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p1) a1 = Some s1 -> a0 <> a1
u_merge_inv_0_st : forall (p0 : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p0 s t -> Prop
u_conv_str_1_r : forall (p0 : preDTA) (s0 : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p0 s0 t -> Prop
u_conv_str_0_r : forall (p0 : preDTA) (s0 : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p0 s0 t -> Prop
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
semantic_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
u_conv_1_invar_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some (umpl_conv_1 ladj)
u_conv_1_invar_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some (umpl_conv_1 ladj) -> MapGet state d a = Some ladj
u_conv0_5r : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), u_conv_rec_0_r p a t r
u_conv1_5r : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), u_conv_rec_1_r p a t r
u_conv1_5 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), u_conv_rec_1 p a t r
u_conv0_5 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), u_conv_rec_0 p a t r
u_merge_2_5 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), u_merge_inv_0_dta p a t r
u_merge_3_5 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), u_merge_inv_1_dta p a t r
sem_equiv_prop_t = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t : term -> Prop

``` 
intros p0 p1 a t Hrec.
unfold reconnaissance, u_merge, uad_conv_1.
simpl.
intros ladj Hmap Hstate. 
apply rec_dta with (ladj := ladj).
exact Hmap.
apply state_reconnait with (c := a) (tl := tnil) (l := prec_empty).
exact Hstate.
apply rec_empty.
Qed.
```

original: intros p0 p1 a t Hrec. unfold reconnaissance, u_merge, uad_conv_1. simpl. intros ladj Hmap Hstate. apply rec_dta with (ladj := ladj). apply Hmap. apply state_reconnait with (c := a) (tl := tnil) (l := prec_empty). apply Hstate. apply rec_empty.
